participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing her love for crafts and building connections with others who have similar interests.
participant_1.background: I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler. I've been saving up my allowance to buy a new bike. My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques. i have 8 brothers and we are close. I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Mark finds joy in storytelling and expressing himself through writing.
participant_2.background: I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years. I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog. I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind. sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning. I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

content.text: Hi! I love the color green too!
Hey! I'm glad we have that in common!
What's your favorite thing about green?
It's calming and peaceful. I like to look at green things when I'm stressed out.
Same here! I like to knit and I like to use green yarn because it's so soothing.
That's so cool! I wish I could knit. I'm blind, so I can't really see what I'm doing.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you're very talented in other ways.
Thank you. I like to write and I have a blog where I share my love of comic books and animals.
That's great! I love comic books too. I'm also really interested in cultural heritage. What's yours?
I'm still exploring mine. I'm part Filipino and I'm learning more about the culture.
That's really interesting! I'm part Mexican and I'm also learning more about my culture.
That's awesome! We can learn about each other's cultures
